name: Grainfruit Meat Soup
description: A soup that consists of a mixture of meat and vegetables. When ordering Grainfruit Meat Soup in Natlan, customers can choose from a variety of different broths as well as a wide range of side dishes. The only fixed rule is this — it must contain lots of Grainfruit.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Grainfruit Meat Soup
suspicious.description: A soup that consists of a mixture of meat and vegetables. The finished product is ashen-grey, a far cry from the bright green you had hoped for... Might this be saved by adding some more vegetables?
suspicious.effect: Restores 20% of Max HP and an additional 900 HP to the selected character.

normal.name: Grainfruit Meat Soup
normal.description: A soup that consists of a mixture of meat and vegetables. When ordering Grainfruit Meat Soup in Natlan, customers can choose from a variety of different broths as well as a wide range of side dishes. The only fixed rule is this — it must contain lots of Grainfruit.
normal.effect: Restores 22% of Max HP and an additional 1,200 HP to the selected character.

delicious.name: Delicious Grainfruit Meat Soup
delicious.description: A soup that consists of a mixture of meat and vegetables. Any single spoonful includes soft meat, crunchy veggies, and a titillating spiciness... This cornucopia of shifting flavors decrees that you entertain seconds!
delicious.effect: Restores 24% of Max HP and an additional 1,500 HP to the selected character.
